GSD.description:
ASoC: rt711-sdca: fix kernel NULL pointer dereference when IO error

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.13 by commit 7bb71133cae88d3003a3490b97864af76533072b. For more details please see the references link.
